metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19757 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
There is a NULL pointer dereference at functionsixel_helper_set_additional_message (status.c) in libsixel 1.8.2 that willcause a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19757` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel1 - 1.8.2-2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsixel package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-2.1').
